alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 10:12PM CDT until June 06 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL TEXAS COUNTY... At 1012 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Hough, or 10 miles southeast of Wilburton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Texas County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
